alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 12 at 11:58AM CST until December 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...North Cass, South Cass, Crow Wing, Northern Aitkin, South Aitkin and Pine Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, Hinckley, Big Sandy Lake, East Lake and, Lena Lake areas. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Cass
